content: cid 0 ferent places i tend to lurk instagram @tsukimountain ravelry tsukiknits email tsukimountain@gmail com also i love seeing your projects please feel free to tag me on instagram or use the #thatwitchsweater so i can check out your awesome sweater or watch your progress if you re interested in sweater kits specifically for this pattern check out my etsy https //www etsy com/listing/1094522797/100-that-witch-sweater-kit ref=shop_home_active_1&crt=1 references / acknowledgements / thank yous all of you who participated in the mkal ravelers ziaralynn for the addition of the bat chart & larger book chart hoopskirtlady for all the additional book page motifs corrypants for the addition of the words 100% that witch sithstitch for the word addition wands the entire forum for inspiration legal tsuki mountain fibres © 2021 this pattern and charts is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern and charts may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way you may not sell any items produced using this pattern version v 1 1 1 21 tsuki mountain fibres i 100% that witch sweater #thatwitchsweater
